title: Poncione del Vènn
text: Poncione del Vènn (or "Poncione del Vanno") is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the Swiss <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Lavertezzo">Lavertezzo</a> in the canton of <a href="Ticino">Ticino</a>. It is located between the valleys of <a href="Valle%20Verzasca">Verzasca</a> and <a href="Leventina">Leventina</a>.
